cab.content: /Gen.No./9954. WAR CABINET. Army Rations. Memorandum "by the Secretary of State for,War,. In continuation of my memorandum of 22nd March, G.T.4006, I circulate -some notes on certain papers which have been laid before the War Cabinet, viz :- (1) A note on G.T.3790 by Sir Alfred Mond and 3985 by the Food Controller. (2) " " G.T.3990 by Mr, Austen Chamberlain. (3) " " G.T.4000 by the Food Controller. ESRBY.27th Maroh, 1918*
